body:
To get into the Halloween spirit, Some Developers (Me, ALM, and Slicorn/Fouled), have decided to "spookify" the hub.

A couple of new features in the hub you might see is the block change, some pumpkins/cobwebs, grass color change, and a neat bat spawner that hopefully is working.

Here is a picture for those who don't feel like logging on:

With Fullbright

Without Fullbright:


Happy Halloween!

(note: Hub will be reverted back the first week of November)
